'''The Copper Age''' is a skin pack promoting [[The Copper Age]]. The pack consists of two skins, one based on a character created to promote a series of [[Character Creator]] items, the other an original design.

|Copper Chemist
|[[File:Copper Chemist.png|width=131x131]]
|A tan-skinned chemist wearing a [[Copper|copper]] themed lab coat that fades from orange to [[Oxidation|oxidized]] green copper and as well as wearing a pair of dark teal gloves with a test tube design on the left glove. Its other clothes are a non-oxidized copper hat and oxidized copper googles, and leather boots. 
|Underneath the goggles, there are no eyes. The chemist has a blank expression, along with black hair and freckles across their skin that resemble oxidized and non-oxidized copper.
|-
|Copper Welder
|[[File:Copper Welder.png|width=131x131]]
|A dark skinned welder with purple hair, wearing a white jacket with brown straps and oxidized and non-oxidized on the shoulder pads, along with brown gloves. Its other clothes, teal pants, a copper welding helmet, and, respectively, an oxidized and non-oxidized [[Copper Golem|copper golem]] slippers.
|A version of [[The Copper Age#The Copper Cape Quest|Copper Golem Slippers]], made to fit the limitations of skins. Under the skin layer reveals her face with her eyes gazing towards the left with a blank expression. 
|}
